message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.DS

The paper discusses the use of Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) as a loss function in deep learning, which is a topic related to machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural networks (cs.NE), and data structures (cs.DS). The paper specifically focuses on the limitations and solutions for incorporating EMD-based loss in deep learning frameworks, which is a sub-topic within these categories.
